string.text: Ammo parts

Even with good supplies, it•s not uncommon to end up with one or more cartridges of what might be considered as •bad• ammunition. Unlucky stalkers might find themselves in very bad situations when their weapons jam at critical moments due to bad cartridges. On the contrary, these ammo parts can be reused for the creation of better variants. That's why some stalkers prefer to keep them around.\n \n
Paper sheets
Torn sheets of silk coated paper. Even in a place like the Zone, it can be used for all kind of things. The cheapest way for packaging food or cleaning dirt.\n \n
Wooden gun parts

Various wooden parts including grips, handguards and stocks. Usable for repairs of old Soviet rifles
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Metal Gun parts

Various metal gun parts ranging from sights, springs, plates and dust covers to rods, screws, bolts and rivets. Usable for maintanance of most if not all firearms.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Metal scrap

Various pieces of metal ranging from screws to sheets. Usable for upgrades of existing gear. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting item
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for upgrades
Electronic parts

Various pieces of electronics, ranging from simple cables and resistors to small circuit boards, with proper tools and some knowledge one could perhaps upgrade even detectors. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting item
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for upgrades
Plastic parts

Various plastic plates, shields, covers and other pieces of furniture commonly found on modern guns of all origins.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Light trigger mechanism

Very light trigger used in cheaper low power firearms.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Medium trigger mechanism

Strengtened trigger mechanism found in slightly stronger guns. It is more durable and provides better control of the gun, its less sensitive and lowers chance of unintentional firing significantly.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Heavy trigger mechanism

Heavy trigger mechanism used in heavy weaponry such as sniper rifles and mechineguns, its very durable and requires so force to be pulled thus making chance of missfire very low.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Light pistol barrel

Light barrel found in smaller pistols that use weaker ammunition like 9x18 and 9x19, one example of such gun is the Makarov Pistol.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Medium pistol barrel

Heavier and more durable barrel used in stronger guns, mainly guns chambered in .45 such as Colt 1911.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Heavy pistol barrel

Heavy barrel used in big heavy democracy spreding guns. Due to impracticality and price of guns its used in, such barrel is rare comodity in the Zone.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Light Soviet rifle barrel

Basic barrel commonly found in cheaper rifles, easy to maintain and not too costly to replace. Due to popularity of cheaper rifles in the Zone this barrel is a common part. Mostly used in 5.45 AK variants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Medium Soviet rifle barrel

Bigger 7.62x39 used in older Sovier rifles. It is more durable to withstand the power of 7.62 rounds. Despite age of 7.62x39 guns these barrels are still relatively common in the Zone.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Heavy Soviet rifle barrel

Strengtened 7.62 barrel made to withstand the more powerful 7.62x54 rounds. Found mainly in sniper rifles and machineguns.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Light NATO rifle barrel

Light barrel chambered in standard 5.56 NATO. Somewhat rarer compared to Soviet barrels but some factions still have plenty of these.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Medium NATO rifle barrel

NATO barrel chambered in 7.62x51, used in heavy ARs and light sniper rifles. Rare but still acessible with right contacts.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Heavy NATO rifle barrel

Heavy barrel chambered in .338 Lapua, only found in powerful western sniper rifles. Rare part in the Zone.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Light shotgun barrel

Standard shotgun barrel with close to half of its original lenght sawn off. Thanks to this it is considerably lighter at cost of far worse accuracy.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Medium shotgun barrel

Commonly used shotgun barrel found in Toz-34 and guns alike.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Heavy shotgun barrel

Strengtened 12 gauge barrel used in more expensive shotguns. Rare in the Zone, not many regular stalkers get their hands on one.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] gun part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Cloth sheets

Basic cloth sheets found in cheap outfits. They dont offer much protection but are cheap to replace and maintain while offering sufficent protection from cold and rain.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Durable cloth sheets

Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Military grade cloth sheets

Sheets of mil-spec sheets, offer significant insulation and protection from bites while being flexible enough not to affect wearers agility. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Leather

Simple leather not too different from that found in biker clothes, offers good protection against bites and scratches but wont stop many bullets. Thanks to its low price compared to kevlar it is often used as ballistic insert in cheap suits. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Ceramic plates

Ceramic ballistic plates offering sufficent protection against small arms fire, while it fails to stop anything bigger than pistol round it is still very good choice for its price and offers much greater protection than simple leather. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Kevlar plates

Kevlar plates used only in the best combat suits of the zone. While offering great protection they are very costly and as such can only be found in high grade military suits, exosuits and combat exoskeletons. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Teflon

Thin sheet of teflon used for waterproofing of cheap leather jackets commonly seen in the zone. While doing its job well it can easily get damaged. Sheets of this thickness are only suitable for cheap suits, better suits will utilize thicker sheets with greater durability. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Durable teflon

Thicker layers of teflon sheets providing much greater durability while keeping the positive traits of thinner layers. Used in mid range suits. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants. %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Military grade teflon

Teflon sheets specially strenghtened to provide better durability without sacrificing agility much. As such can only be seen in higher end combat suits and mid to high range military suits. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants. %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] suit part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
Exoskeleton frame

Extrernal mechanical frame used in Exoskeleton suits, significantly increases wearers carrying capacity at cost of agility. 
Thicker layered cloth sheets found in better suits. While still not offering much ballistic protection they offer good insulation and some protection from claws and teeth of small mutants. %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] exoskeleton part
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for replacement at workshop
